oauth_demo

Class AccessData

  • java.lang.Object
    • oauth_demo.AccessData

  • public class AccessData
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the Dropbox Oauth access token and related information.

    The class includes methods to save the information to disk, and load previously-saved access data. It also includes methods to check for the presence of the file on disk.

    • Field Detail

      • DEMO_DIRECTORY

        public static final java.lang.String DEMO_DIRECTORY
        Pathname of demo directory (the directory containing this file).

        You should not need to change this (although you can if you want files to be stored elsewhere).

      • waitForAccessTokenFile

        public static boolean waitForAccessTokenFile(int messageInterval)
        Wait indefinitely until the access token file exists.
        Parameters:
        messageInterval - how often to print waiting message
        Returns:
        true if file found, false if interrupted
